Protocols/UIEmptyStateDelegate.html#/s:F.name: emptyStateViewDidShow(view:)
Protocols/UIEmptyStateDelegate.html#/s:F.abstract: The call back for when the emptyStateView is now shown on screen

Protocols/UIEmptyStateDelegate.html#/s:F.name: emptyStatebuttonWasTapped(button:)
Protocols/UIEmptyStateDelegate.html#/s:F.abstract: The call back for when the button inside the emptyStateView is tapped

Protocols/UIEmptyStateDelegate.html#/s:F.name: emptyStateViewWasTapped(view:)
Protocols/UIEmptyStateDelegate.html#/s:F.abstract: The call back for when the emptyStateView itself is tapped

Protocols/UIEmptyStateDelegate.html#/s:F.name: emptyStateViewAnimationCompleted(forEmptyStateView:didFinish:)
Protocols/UIEmptyStateDelegate.html#/s:F.abstract: The call back for when the animation of the emptyStateView is done

Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html#/s.name: shouldShowEmptyStateView(forTableView:)
Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html#/s.abstract: Determines whether should or should not show the empty view for a specific tableView, by default it will count tableView rows to determine

Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html#/s.name: shouldShowEmptyStateView(forCollectionView:)
Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html#/s.abstract: Determines whether should or should not show the empty view for a specific collectionView, by default it will count collectionView items to determine

Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html#/s.name: emptyStateView
Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html#/s.abstract: Determines the view to use for the empty state, by default this is a nice stack view

Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html#/s.name: emptyStateViewAdjustsToFitBars
Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html#/s.abstract: Determines whether the emptyStateView should adjust to be shown properly inside by not extending the view

Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html#/s.name: emptyStateTitle
Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html#/s.abstract: Determines the title for the Empty View, by default this just returns an intro message, override for custom title

Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html#/s.name: emptyStateImage
Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html#/s.abstract: Determines the image which will be used inside the Empty State View’s image view, default value is nil

Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html#/s.name: emptyStateImageSize
Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html#/s.abstract: Determines the size of the image view, by default this will return nil which means that the imageview size will just be 100x100

Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html#/s.name: emptyStateButtonTitle
Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html#/s.abstract: Determines the title for the button of the Empty State View, by default this is nil

Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html#/s.name: emptyStateButtonImage
Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html#/s.abstract: Determines the image for the button, by default this will return nil

Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html#/s.name: emptyStateButtonSize
Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html#/s.abstract: Determines the size of the button, by default it will constrain the view to the size of the title plus some padding.

Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html#/s.name: emptyStateDetailMessage
Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html#/s.abstract: Determines the message which will be displayed in the detail view of the empty state view, by default this will return an intro message

Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html#/s.name: emptyStateViewSpacing
Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html#/s.abstract: Determines the amount of spacing between the views, by default this is 12

Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html#/s.name: emptyStateBackgroundColor
Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html#/s.abstract: Determines the background color for the emptyStateView, by default this value is UIColor.clear

Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html#/s.name: emptyStateViewCanScroll
Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html#/s.abstract: Whether the empty state view allows scrolling or not, by default this is false

Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html#/s.name: emptyStateViewCanAnimate
Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html#/s.abstract: Whether the empty state view should animate or not

Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html#/s.name: emptyStateViewAnimatesEverytime
Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html#/s.abstract: Whether the empty state view animates every time it is shown

Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html#/s.name: emptyStateViewAnimationDuration
Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html#/s.abstract: The amount of time the empty state view should animate for

Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html#/s.name: emptyStateViewAnimation(forView:animationDuration:completion:)
Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html#/s.abstract: The animation function for the views in the empty state view

Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html.name: UIEmptyStateDataSource
Protocols/UIEmptyStateDataSource.html.abstract: The data source for the Empty View

Extensions/UICollectionViewController.ht.name: reloadEmptyState()
Extensions/UICollectionViewController.ht.abstract: Reloads the empty state, defaults the collectionView to self.collectionView

Extensions/UITableViewController.html#/s.name: reloadEmptyState()
Extensions/UITableViewController.html#/s.abstract: Reloads the empty state, defaults the tableView to self.tableView

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:vE12.name: emptyStateDataSource
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:vE12.abstract: The data source for the Empty View

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:vE12.name: emptyStateView
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:vE12.abstract: The empty state view associated to the ViewController

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:FE12.name: reloadEmptyState(forTableView:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:FE12.abstract: The method responsible for show and hiding the UIEmptyStateDataSource.viewForEmptyState view

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:FE12.name: reloadEmptyState(forCollectionView:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:FE12.abstract: The method responsible for show and hiding the UIEmptyStateDataSource.viewForEmptyState view

Classes/UIEmptyStateView.html#/s:vC12UIE.name: delegate
Classes/UIEmptyStateView.html#/s:vC12UIE.abstract: The delegate for the view, gets called when user taps button or self

Classes/UIEmptyStateView.html#/s:vC12UIE.name: detailMessage
Classes/UIEmptyStateView.html#/s:vC12UIE.abstract: The detail message for the detail label

Classes/UIEmptyStateView.html#/s:vC12UIE.name: spacing
Classes/UIEmptyStateView.html#/s:vC12UIE.abstract: The spacing in between each of the views

Classes/UIEmptyStateView.html#/s:FC12UIE.name: init(frame:title:)
Classes/UIEmptyStateView.html#/s:FC12UIE.abstract: Initializer for UIEmptyStateView, requires a frame and an NSAttributedString which will be used as it’s title

Classes/UIEmptyStateView.html#/s:FC12UIE.name: updateConstraints()
Classes/UIEmptyStateView.html#/s:FC12UIE.abstract: Override for update constraints, adds the auto layout constraints for the stackviews subviews.

Classes/UIEmptyStateView.html#/s:vC12UIE.name: contentView
Classes/UIEmptyStateView.html#/s:vC12UIE.abstract: The content view which encloses the rest of the subviews, of type UIStackView

Classes/UIEmptyStateView.html#/s:vC12UIE.name: titleView
Classes/UIEmptyStateView.html#/s:vC12UIE.abstract: The title view which displays the value of title, place below the image view

Classes/UIEmptyStateView.html#/s:vC12UIE.name: imageView
Classes/UIEmptyStateView.html#/s:vC12UIE.abstract: The image view which displays the value of image, placed above the title label

Classes/UIEmptyStateView.html#/s:vC12UIE.name: button
Classes/UIEmptyStateView.html#/s:vC12UIE.abstract: The button for the empty state view, title is set to the value of buttonTitle, placed at the bottom of the view

Classes/UIEmptyStateView.html#/s:vC12UIE.name: detailView
Classes/UIEmptyStateView.html#/s:vC12UIE.abstract: The optional detail view, placed under title view, only displayed if detailMessage has a value

Classes/UIEmptyStateView.html.name: UIEmptyStateView
Classes/UIEmptyStateView.html.abstract: A UIView which has a stack view and inside the stackview are 1-4 other views
